Class GitHubService

java.lang.Object
dev.vernite.vernite.integration.git.github.GitHubService
@Service public class GitHubService extends Object
Service for GitHub integration.

  • Method Details

    • getAuthorizationUrl

      public URI getAuthorizationUrl(String state) throws URISyntaxException
      Get the GitHub OAuth installation URL for the given state.
      Parameters:
      state - the state to pass to GitHub
      Returns:
      the installation URL
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - if the URL cannot be built

      Returns:

    • getUserRepositories

      Parameters:
      user - the user
      Returns:
      list with all repositories
